pr_title: [WFLY-13991]: Artemis should not delete corrupt log files.

timeline.message:
[WFLY-13991]: Artemis should not delete corrupt log files.

* Adding attribute max-attic-files on the journal definition.

timeline.bodyText:
Can you please parametrize this hard-coded path? Maybe that something like this could help:
            File target = new File(System.getProperty("jboss.home"), "standalone/data/activemq/journal/attic/");
timeline.author: marekkopecky

timeline.bodyText: Now we have two test methods. First call of this method (and the following start in the following setup method) seems to be useless. Can you call this container.stop after all test methods are executed (and not after each test method)? Maybe that ServerSetupTask could help (like in this example)?
timeline.author: marekkopecky

timeline.bodyText: Can you please add some general javadoc here? Or add javadoc to each testmethod? So far just one test method has javadoc
timeline.author: marekkopecky
